name: Shifter (NorwegianMan, Harold Air Conditioner, I'm Sleepy)
name_original: Shifter (NorwegianMan, Harold Air Conditioner, I'm Sleepy)
description:
You are Smelly, stuck in a purgatory between heaven and hell. You have to get out by using your wits and your jumping skills. Use your power of shifting to show different parts of the level each time you shift, and use this to get to the top.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

LSHIFT - Shift

Credits:

Daniel Karlsrud Berg - Programmer, Sound Design

Harold AC - Programmer, UI

Samantha Torres - Level Designer, Artist
